sentences.en: a public execution
sentences.cn: 当众处死

sentences.en: Before execution, he admitted to taking the lives of at least 35 more women.
sentences.cn: 被处决之前，他承认另外还杀死过至少35名女性。

sentences.en: Execution by lethal injection is scheduled for July 30th.
sentences.cn: 定于7月30日执行注射死刑。

sentences.en: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution.
sentences.cn: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

sentences.en: He faced execution by hanging for murder.
sentences.cn: 他因谋杀要以绞刑处死。

sentences.en: He found it distasteful to be offered drinks before witnessing the execution.
sentences.cn: 他觉得在目睹行刑前还要上酒让人很不舒服。

sentences.en: He was granted a stay of execution (= delay in carrying out an execution ).
sentences.cn: 他被准予缓期处决。

sentences.en: His original idea was good, but his execution of the scheme was disastrous.
sentences.cn: 他的设想很好, 但实行起来却糟糕透顶.

sentences.en: I can imagine no greater miscarriage of justice than the execution of an innocent man.
sentences.cn: 我想象不出比处死无辜的人更加严重的误判了。

sentences.en: The bombardment did no great execution.
sentences.cn: 那次轰炸未造成重大伤害.

sentences.en: THE following chapters are, in a sense, the execution of a bequest.
sentences.cn: 以下各章, 在某种程度上是实现遗愿.

sentences.en: the formulation and execution of urban policy
sentences.cn: 城市政策的制定与实施

sentences.en: The ideas in the show's presentation were good, but failed in execution.
sentences.cn: 那场展览陈述的想法很好，但是没能实现。

sentences.en: The musician's execution was perfect, but he played without feeling.
sentences.cn: 演奏者的技巧完美, 但他演奏得毫无感情.

sentences.en: The people were clamouring for his execution.
sentences.cn: 人民强烈要求处死他.

sentences.en: The show uses Zondo's trial and execution as its framework.
sentences.cn: 这部戏以桑多的受审和被处决作为基本框架。

sentences.en: The speech did good execution for our side.
sentences.cn: 这篇讲话对我们这一方大有良好效果.

sentences.en: The two men face execution (= They will be killed as a punishment ).
sentences.cn: 两名男子面临处决。

sentences.en: This picture has a bravura of execution.
sentences.cn: 这幅画作风大胆.

sentences.en: Torture and summary execution (= execution without a trial or any legal process ) are common.
sentences.cn: 严刑拷打和不经审判就地处决相当普遍。

words.tran_cn: 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的
执行，执行程序；主任参谋，副舰长
经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员
执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 程序运行，程序执行
实行，实施，执行；完成；实现
停止执行；（死刑）缓期执行

trans.tran_en: a process in which you do something that has been carefully planned
